text:
="preserve">Jacques Rosny (25 March 1939 – 18 April 2020) was a French actor and comedian. He was born in Tarbes, France. In 1973, he bought Théâtre de l'Athénée. His best known roles were in "The Tenant", "Catherine & Co." and "L.627". In 1985, he won the Prix du Brigadier.
Rosny died on 18 April 2020 of COVID-19 in Nogent-sur-Marne, France, aged 81.
